gw.bizrules.pcf

Class RulePermissionUIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.pcf.RulePermissionUIHelper

  • public class RulePermissionUIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides permission checking methods for BizRules PCFs to check for permissions

      • canEditRule

        public static boolean canEditRule(RuleVersion ruleVersion)
        Checks if the current user has edit permissions for that specific rule type within the parameter rule version
        Parameters:
        ruleVersion - the rule version on whose rule permissions are to be checked
        Returns:
        True/False if the user has permissions

public static java.lang.String checkAndGetImportPermissionMsg()

      • checkAndGetEditPermissionMsg

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String checkAndGetEditPermissionMsg(IEntityType ruleType)
        Deprecated. With 10.0.0, this method is not used anymore by the bizrules framework and should be removed
        Checks if the current user has edit permissions otherwise returns the appropriate exception message. It first checks the permission provider before passing in the exception message from Rule.EDIT. (Once 10.0.0 is complete this should only return the exception message and not check for the deprecated permission provider)
        Parameters:
        ruleType - the subtype of Rule type whose permissions are being checked
        Returns:
        Empty string if permission is true otherwise the error message

      • checkAndGetEditPermissionMsg

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String checkAndGetEditPermissionMsg(RuleVersion ruleVersion)
        Deprecated. With 10.0.0, this method is not used anymore by the bizrules framework and should be removed
        Checks if the current user has edit permissions otherwise returns the appropriate exception message. It first checks the permission provider before passing in the exception message from Rule.EDIT. (Once 10.0.0 is complete this should only return the exception message and not check for the deprecated permission provider)
        Parameters:
        ruleVersion - the rule version on whose rule permissions are to be checked
        Returns:
        Empty string if permission is true otherwise the error message

      • checkAndGetDeployPermissionMsg

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String checkAndGetDeployPermissionMsg(IEntityType ruleType)
        Deprecated. With 10.0.0, this method is not used anymore by the bizrules framework and should be removed
        Checks if the current user has deploy permissions otherwise returns the appropriate exception message.
        Parameters:
        ruleType - the subtype of Rule type whose permissions are being checked
        Returns:
        Empty string if permission is true otherwise the error message

      • checkAndGetDeployPermissionMsg

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String checkAndGetDeployPermissionMsg(RuleVersion ruleVersion)
        Deprecated. With 10.0.0, this method is not used anymore by the bizrules framework and should be removed
        Checks if the current user has deploy permissions otherwise returns the appropriate exception message. It first checks the permission provider before passing in the exception message from Rule.DEPLOY. (Once 10.0.0 is complete this should only return the exception message and not check for the deprecated permission provider)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Empty string if permission is true otherwise the error message

public static java.lang.String checkAndGetApprovePermissionMsg(RuleVersion ruleVersion)

It first checks the permission provider before passing in the exception message from Rule.APPROVE. (Once 10.0.0 is complete this should only return the exception message and not check for the deprecated permission provider)
